DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical trial evaluate effect new infant starter formula add prebiotics ( GOS ) fat blend rich beta-palmitate .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Infant Formula With Milkfat Prebiotics
DOC.detailed_description: An experimental infant formula add prebiotics ( GOS ) high content palmitic acid esterify beta-position test double-blinded randomized control trial . The addition prebiotics infant formula favor growth beneficial bifidogenic intestinal flora positive effect immunity , promote soft stool formation short chain fatty acid content stool . Higher proportion beta-palmitic acid esterify 2nd position triglyceride reduce formation fatty acid-calcium soap stool promote calcium fat absorption gut , therfor reduce symptom constipation colic .
DOC.criteria: healthy term neonates gestational age 37 42 week birth weight 10th 90th percentile ( Voigt reference ) infants exclusively formulafed enrollment infant high risk atopic disease due family history congenital disorder syndrome need special diet / impairment growth antibiotic medication prior enrollment
